container.heading: State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Specialized Health Care Services — Cardiac Surgery and Percutaneous Coronary Intervention Services

section.heading: Incorporation by Reference.
section.text: The State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Specialized Health Care Services — Cardiac Surgery and Percutaneous Coronary Intervention Services is incorporated by reference.

annotations.annotation: Health-General Article, §§19-109(a) and (3), 19-118, 19-120, and 19-120.1, Annotated Code of Maryland
Regulation .01 amended effective January 15, 1996 (23:1 Md. R. 25)
Regulation .01 repealed and new Regulation .01 adopted effective December 1, 1997 (24:24 Md. R. 1670)
Regulation .01 amended effective May 14, 2001 (28:9 Md. R. 885); March 15, 2004 (31:5 Md. R. 449); August 10, 2009 (36:16 Md. R. 1251)
Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective January 14, 2012 (39:3 Md. R. 257); amended permanently effective March 19, 2012 (39:5 Md. R. 382)
Regulation .01 amended effective August 18, 2014 (41:16 Md. R. 946); November 9, 2015 (42:22 Md. R. 1378)
Regulation .01 repealed and new Regulation .01 adopted effective January 14, 2019 (46:1 Md. R. 12)
